creator: michael.trindler@id.unizh.ch
text:
the search node is invisible (this results in a larger gap between the tabs
"Features" and "News" in the WYSIWYG view) - or fix the stylesheets so that
invisible nodes do not cause larger gaps

the fact that the search node provides functionality rather than data is also a
reason to set it apart from the other nodes

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text: Fixed the xsl in 556035. Thanks for reporting.
